fmod.command.version.error: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving the version information.
fmod.command.dev.end: Finish executing the dev function, the return value is %s.
fmod.command.dev.error: Exception when printing the stack trace of the dev function.
fmod.command.gpt.error: Failed to connect to the server.
fmod.command.reload.error: An error occurred while reloading the configuration file.
fmod.options.title: F Minecraft Mod Options
fmod.options.hint.translate:
If enabled, the server will translate all the messages and then send to the client.
This is useful if only the server has this mod installed and the client does not have it.
But if enabled, the message will not follow the client's language setting.
This option will not working on the client side.
Default: false
fmod.options.hint.entdeathmsg:
If enabled, the server will send an actionbar message to the client when an entity dies.
Default: true
fmod.options.hint.gpturl:
The URL of the target GPT server when executing command /f gpt.
This mod will use the OpenAI API. So if you want to deploy a local LLM, you must make sure it is compatible with the OpenAI API.
Default: "http://127.0.0.1:12345/v1/chat/completions"
fmod.options.hint.gptkey:
The access tokens of the GPT server.
If the sever does not need an access token, leave it blank.
Default: ""
fmod.misc.version: Minecraft %s, F Minecraft Mod version %s, Copyright %s.
